description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

@Icon[type:sense-dependent]

Through a mix of complex manipulation and other cues, you focus enemies’ fire on an ally. As a standard action, you can spend 1 Resolve Point and select a willing ally within 30 feet. Until the end of your next turn, enemies within 100 feet of that ally who can sense both you and that ally take a –4 penalty to all ranged attacks they make that don’t target that ally. This ability otherwise acts as if that ally used the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cDTGl7g2ZvJfrccz]{Draw Fire (Ex) (Envoy)} improvisation.

You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cDTGl7g2ZvJfrccz]{Draw Fire (Ex) (Envoy)} improvisation to choose this improvisation.
